headline: Jim Cramer on Thermo Fisher: “It Does Seem Like it’s Bottoming”
summary: Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE:TMO) is one of the 21 stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Expressing that they believe that the stock has significant potential for growth, a caller inquired about TMO. In response, Cramer said: “This stock is unbelievable. It was a, it’s a great company.
